trend_summary: Across the series the patchy settlements expand slightly, with new housing pockets and road upgrades creeping into former fields. Forest edges thicken, some cropland shifts to greener pasture, and only small industrial footprints appear. Overall, growth is modest, keeping the landscape predominantly green and semi-rural.
notable_changes: Incremental infill and outward growth of housing estates in the south-central sector.
Northâ€“south arterial road widened and straightened, improving regional connectivity.
Several large brown fields transition to lush pasture or crop rotation, boosting vegetation cover.
New light-industrial/commercial block constructed near the eastern edge of the study area.
Forest canopy densifies on the north-western ridge, indicating gradual reforestation.
